title: Elementalist Lux rarely playing voice over lines
body: It seems like when you transform Elementalist Lux into basically any non-light form, she barely speaks her updated voice over lines. I haven't seen if it was consistent across all transformations, but Dark, Ice, and Air all seemed to have this problem.

replies.body: Yea this is one of the many bugs that were found on the PBE, but didn't get fixed before the skin got released...

It actually did - the percentage of triggering was increased from what it originally was on PBE. I'm speaking with an audio engineer to see if it's something that could be bumped a bit more without overplaying.

Hey,

Could we get an update on this?

I actually just bought Elementalist Lux and noticed the problem as well.

At least for her fire form, movement lines never played. Literally. I spammed/clicked all over the map for about five minutes and not a single line played.

When I went to magma form, I heard some though.

Hey! 

Looks like everything is hooked up properly. I will say that some of the forms have some voice processing, which means that if one line isn't done playing, another won't. It's basically the 'trail' of the VO finishing. Another example of this occurring would be with Reaper Soraka, where you can't spam her emotes, and if the 'tail' isn't done on one line of VO, another won't play, but she'll still do the animation.
This was adjusted from the original play rate (increased). I can see if it's something we can bump up a bit more in terms of frequency.

I don't think this is a matter of the trigger rate being too low. There is a bug which sometimes causes a form to simply not play any of its voice lines (except for the initial transformation and the R cast voice line). This happened to me with Dark form for several games in a row. Lux was quite chatty in Light, Nature, and Air forms, but the moment I switched to Dark form she went completely silent, except to yell "FADE!" when I cast my ult. On my 4th or 5th game in that form, the bug didn't activate, and she was speaking quite frequently for the rest of the game. I've also run into this problem with Storm form. I have yet to hear that form's voice lines. Nature, Air, Fire, and Magma forms work normally for me, and I haven't tried the rest yet.
